status.name: Open

fields.description:
Splash Screen does not appear in landscape mode.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a default app and and try launching the app in landscape mode.

Actual Result:
1. Splash screen does not appear.

Expected Result:
1. Splash Screen must appear.


Issue occurs on both iOS and Android
fields.summary: SplashScreen does not appear while launching app in landscape mode
fields.environment:
Test Environment:

Appc Studio: 3.2.3.201404151910
Sdk:3.2.3.v20140324164913
alloy:1.3.1
titanium:3.2.3-alpha2
titanium-code-processor:1.1.1-alpha
Osx: Maverick(10.9.2)
